column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This was my first time at JINYA and I was very impressed. I have been craving ramen noodles since NYC and I absolutely loved this place. I sat at the bar and Kristine and Ruben attended us. It was the Best service we've ever had! They were so kinda and attentive
column2: they made our first time experience spectacular
column3: thanks guys!!!! Hands down.. If your craving authentic ramen noodle soup
column4: this is the place to go.
